law.catch_line: Powers of state agencies to acquire or dispose of land limited.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 496, sec. 35, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 111, sec. 4. -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 140, sec. 1, effective June 19, 1958. -- Amended 1956 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 7, Art. XVI, sec. 8. -- Created 1949 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 11, sec. 7.
